name: GBost Town
description:
You must solve the mysteries of GBost Town and defeat the evil wizard lurking within to claim the hidden treasure! There are countless obstacles to overcome and death is always waiting!

This is an unofficial Gameboy recreation of Ghost Town for the Commodore. Some things are different but most things are the same. It's been created with GB Studio. It's somewhat playable and you can beat the game, but it's a work in progress and some things still need added.
